creator: trevor@vocaro.com
text:
Two source files in the BCEL repository are zero-length:

http://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/jakarta/bcel/trunk/src/main/java/org/apache/bcel/generic/
AnnotationGen.java
http://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/jakarta/bcel/trunk/src/main/java/org/apache/bcel/generic/
ElementNameValuePairGen.java

These files should contain some source code or they should be removed.
